name: Magdi Yacoub
title: Egyptian surgeon
quote: I don't have any regrets. I consider myself really privileged to belong to medicine and do what I do. I would do it all again.

name: Albert Einstein
title: Theoretical Physicist
quote: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer. Persistence is key to success. Every problem presents an opportunity to learn and grow, so don't be discouraged by challenges. Keep pushing forward, and you'll achieve great things.

name: Nelson Mandela
title: Revolutionary, Politician
quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world. Knowledge empowers individuals to enact positive change and build a brighter future for themselves and their communities. Embrace the transformative power of education and strive to make a difference.

name: Steve Jobs
title: Co-founder of Apple
quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. Find your passion and pursue it with dedication and perseverance. True fulfillment comes from following your heart.

name: Mon3em
title: Co-founder of 3azma
quote: Success is the culmination of relentless effort, unwavering commitment, and the resilience to persevere through challenges, ultimately leading to the fulfillment of one's goals and aspirations.
